chapter.title: Introduction
chapter.para: Log4sh has been developed under the Bourne Again Shell (bash) on Linux, but great care has been taken to make sure it works under the default Bourne Shell of Solaris (sh) as the platform is still widely used.

listitem.para: Public Domain Korn Shell (pdksh) -- partial functionality

chapter.para: See the appropriate Release Notes (doc/RELEASE_NOTES-X.X.X.txt) for this release for the actual versions tested.

section.title: Credits / Contributors
section.para: A list of contributors to log4sh can be found in the source archive as doc/contributors.txt. I want to personally thank all those who have contributed to make this a better tool.
